checked-icon.desc: The icon to be used when the model is truthy; Use in conjuction with 'unchecked-icon' otherwise it is ignored

unchecked-icon.desc: The icon to be used when the toggle is falsy; Use in conjuction with 'checked-icon' otherwise it is ignored

indeterminate-icon.desc: The icon to be used when the model is indeterminate; Use in conjuction with 'checked-icon' and 'unchecked-icon' otherwise it is ignored
